amendment.description: Amendment to the Skaggs amendment (A003) deletes funding for TV Marti and retains funds for other international broadcasting programs. Amendment failed with the rejection of the Skaggs amendment (A003). See Roll Call No. 382.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate funding for TV Marti and retain $2,000 for other international boradcasting programs.

action.text: Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Moran (VA) to the Skaggs amendment (A003).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
